repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Files pertaining to schools for workers, including Affiliated Schools for Workers; Bryn Mawr; School for Officer Workers; Southern Summer School for Workers; WPA; WTUL; and YWCA.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Files pertaining to schools for workers, including Affiliated Schools for Workers; Bryn Mawr; School for Officer Workers; Southern Summer School for Workers; WPA; WTUL; and YWCA.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Joyce Kornbluh Labor Education Files #5797. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
